name: Discord Profile Pictures
description:
What?

When creating products that employ user profile pictures, it's hard to avoid using images of real people because it's so easy to do and doesn't really matter in the long run, though I see using stock photos of real people makes the product look very serious and strict.

Discord, on the other hand, took a more playful and inventive approach, creating their own graphics to show profile pictures on their website.

Personally, I've become fond of Discord's illustrations due to their wonderful use of colour, so I set out to create Discord-related profile images that can be utilized in day-to-day projects to give a little more pop to your designs.


What I've done.

After trawling through every one of Discord's illustrations, I've compiled a small list of profile pictures that contain each and every unique character from the vectorized illustrations from Discord's website.

There are already over 75 different characters to choose from, each with its own name, unique shape, colour scheme, and personality.


Future Plans.

At the moment, Discord only has about 53 78 characters that can be used as profile photos (due to their size and overall personification-nes). Though, as Discord's website continues to grow and add new features, I'll be hunting for more potential profile images.
